page.title: 05MY WEEKEND IN PURITON
page.content:
On friday evening I got ready to go to modern{dancing.}I have my lessons at Weston-super-Mare. My teacher is called Miss Draint,but she is ill in hospital so I had Miss Musle.I got home at 9 o'clock and watched "Cover Up".....It was brillant.On Saturday morning I got ready for{Ballet}( Grade 4) and my Tap (Grade 2). While I was waiting to go to Tap I went with Hannah and Tina to a shop where we bought some sweets.
On sunday morning I had breakfast in bed(I had porriage ugh!!!) After I got dressed I had a game of cricket with my brother Jason.It started to rain so went inside and played on our{Computer we played "suntrap" and "jet-set willy".For dinner we had gammon,chips and peas. {BY TINA CAMP.AGE 9.
